name: The Darkest Hour
description:
Description:

Short atmospheric exploration platformer about being tiny ghosts finding things around the world before passing on, fading away, or maybe coming back to life.

Creator Info:

First project as a first year game art student, hopefully I can make more polished projects in the future. Sorry if the exe is stopped as a virus, I used GameMaker for the engine and have no idea how to unflag it. Pressing 'run anyway' should work.

Key Features:

  • Painterly background art
  • 6 Endings
  • Equipable Cosmetics

Release date/Platform/Controls:

30/06/2021, Windows only, WASD (explained in-game)

If you like the background art, the full quality images are available to download :)

Contact:

@zhoartu on Twitter and Instagram

Music Credits:

https://www.freetousesounds.com/
